reviews.title: Win some... lose some...
reviews.review_text: I originally ordered 2 different styles of 'Crocs' and a pair of leopard print shoes, ordering according to the measurements of my feet, size 8 - 8%261/2. The shoes did fit okay. The 'Crocs' turned out to be much too large. One was not in the pattern as pictured. So, I ordered another pair of each style of 'Crocs' in size 7. One was sent in the correct size which I am keeping. This style, which I am reviewing was sent in a size 11... way too large... but in the same pattern as originally pictured!!! Now I have to go through the process of returning things... ugh!!!
I'm returning this brand, as I've also purchased the original Crocs from Walmart. I would prefer to stick with the Crocs I know after seeing this brand.

reviews.title: Run large
reviews.review_text: These are good for what I bought them for (shoes to wear when we have to go to the dump), but they run very large and will slip off if you do a lot of walking in them. I don't think they would be good for yard work or marine environments. The pink is a true light pink, not a coral pink as it appears on the screen. This actually was a nice surprise as I prefer true pink. They are very light.
